app_name: Nigerian Movie : 🇳🇬 Free Movies, Music and Drama
app_detail:
Watch all the latest and oldies Nigeria and All African movies, serious movies, comedy videos, News, Sport and other Nigerian entrainment videos.
- Watch Nigerian Nollywood movies.
- Watch all African movies.
- Watch and Listen all African Music.
- Watch and Listen Nigerian musics.
- Watch Nigerian Serious movies.
- Watch Nigerian and all African funny videos.
- Watch Nigeria and all African Sport news.
